text: Robert Ito (born July 2, 1931) is a Canadian actor. He is of Japanese ancestry. He is known for his roles as Sam Fujiyama on the 1976â€“83 NBC series Quincy, M.E. and Larry Mishima on the 1980s CBS primetime soap opera Falcon Crest. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1931 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian movie actors Category:Canadian television actors Category:Canadian stage actors Category:Canadian voice actors Category:Actors from Vancouver
